qas.question: What method is used that involves synchronization of a application?

answers.text: construction phase of the software development lifecycle

qas.question: What does Development testing look to eliminate?
What method is used that involved syncopation of an application?

plausible_answers.text: construction phase of the software development lifecycle

qas.question: When is development testing not used?
Development Testing attempts to eliminate instruction errors before code is promoted where?
Development Testing is designed by who?

context: <a0_0><b3_0>Development Testing<b3_0/><a0_0/> is a software development process that involves synchronized application of a broad spectrum of defect prevention and detection strategies in order to reduce software development risks, time, and costs. It is performed by the <b6_0>software developer or engineer<b6_0/> during the <a1_0><b4_0>construction phase of the software development lifecycle<b4_0/><a1_0/>. Rather than replace traditional QA focuses, it augments it. Development Testing aims to eliminate <a2_0>construction errors<a2_0/> before code is promoted to <b5_0>QA<b5_0/>; this strategy is intended to increase the quality of the resulting software as well as the efficiency of the overall development and QA process.
